text: Good bookmaker, shocking online/app. The layout and offers are good, standard in line with most others but if you use a bookmaker app for streaming, be it live race feed or virtual platform look elsewhere. Its awful. Feed constantly freezes or doesn't work at all and app prone to freezing completely. If you have ATR/RUK on TV to watch then fine, but if you want to stream look elsewhere.

If the odds decrease after a bet has been made, your odds will change so you win less than was agreed when you made the bet. If they increase, surprise surprise, you already made bet doesn't change. Is this even legal? Doesn't update fast enough and the score often incorrectly changes, which delays the new odds even more. If overwatch games go beyond map 3, you likely won't be able to bet on further maps as, by the time it registers that there's a 4th/5th map, the match has started.

Wouldn't recommend! as took my money then ask for verification so send them a photo of driving licence which they accept but say I need a letter bill/bank statement so I send a photo of bank statement then ask me for driving license so send another photo of ID then I'm told I can't use driving licence ðŸ˜© so I ask if I can be refunded as the ID they want is hard to sort out mid pandemic of covid 19 they say no as I haven't been verified! Go anywhere but here!
Only use it for the Racing but really love the App. Very easy to use, useful form guides, too.

Fantastic Sky Bet App - It's so easy to sign in - So easy to use and has lots of great features with it - like linking you to Sky Vegas and Sky Bingo - Would recommend that you get if you are a Sky Bet Customer!!!
Easy to use with all areas covered in the gambling world. Great daily bonuses
Easy to navigate, and lots of options, request a bet is fantastic
Freezes, when I minimise the app on my phone it's slow and lags when I reopen it which is annoying. Otherwise easy to use and clear.
By far the best sports betting app and they are in my opinion easily one of the best bookmakers. 5 Star!
Every time iv won on the prize machine it tells me to log in to collect prize. How did I spin it in the 1st place if I wasn't already logged in. Sort it out skybet
As I always like to update everyone skybet hav resolved there issues with withdrawals and restored my faith in them so yes I would now recommend the company and also the app.
Quick to navigate, get the bets I want not like other betting apps, suits me brilliantly
Easy to navigate, quick & love the fingerprint login!
Very good app, indeed - Worth checking out at the very least!!!
Great app works well, free daily spin in sky Vegas is a bit of fun too.
By far the best and easiest betting app to use.
Great service. Really helps as we are on lock down

Decent app to use but sometimes i don't understand how Sky bet work stuff out. I've bet on Leipzig to reach the quarters of champions League, which they obviously have. But for some reason they are not paying out yet. I can guarantee if it was bet365 it would be in my account straight after the final whistle.
Pulled there finger out recently, sky casino a plus but sky Vegas still not paying out

Sky Bet routinely screw you over on bets like shots on target where they subjectively deem it not to be intentional, even when the official stats say otherwise. I do not recommend them as a betting company, and therefore do not recommend the app.
Exceptional love the promotions unfortunatly in this currant situation and losing my job i cant bet or qualify for your great free offers but times will get better thankyou to the sky bet team

Great betting app , the video player doesn't work though it just says the video failed to load please try again . Been trying for years with no joy. The only thing letting it down and a big part of the app too.
More often than not the odds are significantly shorter than all the other bookmakers
Apps is so slow even on fast wifi clicking onna team and it takes about 10 seconds to register. Can take ages to make up a simple 5-10 game acca. Using other services until its updated again.
Good app, never had any problems. I'd prefer it if it stayed scrolled down a page when I minimise the app and open it again but instead it jumps back to the top of the page

Brilliant betting app gives you the options not to keep chasing your lost bets check all profit and losses only thing that does annoy it seems to jam at times when cashout is available cost me some pennies this year due to this but might just be me

Can beat this app for sports bets one of the best out there by miles only one big problem when u pin your games and you get notifications on players getting yellow cards please allow the app to turn these notifications off for yellow cards it's so annoying
Good all arpund. I have not had any problems with app at all. Even when I withdrew winning went into my bank within 3/5 working days.

Used another betting app before but sky bet seems much better
One of the best all sports betting apps around
Good consistent free 5 pound offer . A little shorter on odds in comparison to other online bookmakers on sports bets

Fast and reliable betting app. Just wish they would sort this depositing issue I am having in the app. Whereby I need to delete the app, and go to the mobile site, to be able to deposit from my paypal account, and then re-install the app again.
Great and easy to use and I am only a small amount gambler so great for all gamblers, fantastic

Great service, quick and easy. Everything works. Money paid back into my account within mimutes, what more could you ask for.
